assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All the authors declare no potential conflict of interest except Dr Urtizberea who has received compensation for consultancy and development of educational presentations and Dr Gherardi who has received unrelated basic research grants from the Association Française contre les Myopathies (AFM).
